actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution providing for the payment or reimbursement of expenses incurred by staff persons accompanying members-elect at organizational caucuses and conferences.

summary.text: Provides for the payment or reimbursement of expenses incurred by staff persons accompanying Members-elect at organizational caucuses and conferences. Limits such reimbursement to one staff person.

titles.title: Resolution providing for the payment or reimbursement of expenses incurred by staff persons accompanying members-elect at organizational caucuses and conferences.
